game

Class Parcel

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.Parcel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BoardElement, Colorable, UserData, org.json.JSONString

    public class Parcel
extends java.lang.Object
implements BoardElement
    Class Parcel represents a carriable and deliverable package in the game. Each Parcel has a start location and a destination. When dropped off at its desired destination, the parcel disappears from the game and the player is awarded points. If the parcel matches colors with the Truck carrying it, the point award for delivery is higher

    Only one truck can carry a parcel at a time, each truck can carry a maximum of one parcel.
    Author:
    MPatashnik
